document_data.name: Adrian Martikov
document_data.mainbody:
'''Adrian Martikov''' was a vintner who lived and worked at his family's vineyard, the [[Wizard of Wines]], in the domain of [[Barovia]].{{Cite comic/Shadows of the Vampire 2}}

{{Quote|Ah, yes, more strangers from distant lands, that seems to be happening a lot lately...|Adrian, to the [[wild mage]] [[Delina]].}}
document_data.Personality: He was a gracious and generous man who did all he could to honor the Martikov family name. Unlike so many others in Barovia, he kept an optimistic and positive outlook on things, even during dire circumstances.
document_data.Activities: Adrian worked hard to help his family's business, making deliveries by cart despite the obscuring fog and dangers found along the road.
document_data.Relationships: Adrian was a part of the [[Martikov]] family, that also included his father [[Davian martikov|Davian]].
document_data.History:
Some time ''circa'' the 1480s [[DR]] of the [[Faer√ªn]]ian calendar, Adrian was transporting a cart full of wine [[cask]]s when he was assaulted by a pack of [[ghoul]]s. Speeding away from the undead monsters, Adrian's speeding cart attracted the attention of the [[Toril]]lian adventurers known as the [[Heroes of Baldur's Gate]] and he was saved from a rather grim death.

In a gesture of gratitude, he offered the adventurers lodging for the night, in the vineyard's stables, along with a free bottle of ''[[Red Dragon Crush]]''.{{Cite comic/Shadows of the Vampire 3}}
